images.summary: This section view details a thickened edge foundation with a slope grade away of 2% and optional insulation. The sill plate is secured with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts spaced at 48 inches on center, with openings left at door locations. The foundation includes four 15M rebar bars, with cover specifications noted elsewhere. The slab reinforcement options include 6x6x6 welded wire mesh (WWM), a 16" x 16" 10M grid, or fiber mesh. A 6 mil poly vapor barrier is optional, and the base consists of compacted granular 'A'. The section also specifies a minimum of 2 inches (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi. Dimensions include a 6-foot width, a 2-inch thickened edge, and a 1-foot depth.

1'-0"
images.summary: This section illustrates an intermediate thickened strip footing with continuous reinforcement using two 15M rebar bars. The footing is supported by compacted granular 'A' and includes a minimum of 2 inches (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi, accompanied by a 6 mil poly layer. The section is 1 foot deep, providing structural support for the floating slab.

images.summary: This plan view shows the layout of a floating slab foundation, measuring 60 feet by 52 feet. The slab is reinforced with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts spaced at 48 inches on center. Section callouts 1/S1, 2/S1, and 3/S1 indicate where detailed sections of the slab are provided. The plan provides a top-down view of the slab's dimensions and reinforcement layout, essential for ensuring proper construction and load distribution.
